name: Recordbooks
description: 'Recordbooks' is a photorealistic bodycam  first-person tactical shooter game developed in unreal engine 5 with the latest  technology . Recordbooks features completely new type game mechanics and story in a photorealistic Environment. it also features 8K Resulation.Players will experience new feature , new story and new type of gameplay in Recordbooks.Its a newly designed unique tactical  game where you will play as a secret agent whose duty is to solve the complex and mysterious  cases.. There will be some mysterious and complex cases at your duty area. Your secret agency authority will send you to investigate and  handle the situation and a officer will be connected with you wirelessly from control office. Player will reach there and fight against the opposition and take control the area from enemy without doing any harm to the innocent .Rescue the innocent , destroy the enemy and gain your victory with your tactical skill.
